## Contributors

We appreciate all contributions throughout Epiverse - big or small ðŸ’œ Below you can find anybody who has participated in our discussions, contributed code, or reported a bug at some point (in alphabetical order). They are what makes Epiverse possible.

::: <div class="contributor-grid">

```{r, results='asis', echo = FALSE}
file.path("_data", "epiverse_contributors.csv") |>
  read.csv() |>
  as.list() |>
  purrr::transpose() |>
  purrr::map_chr(~ knitr::knit_expand(file = "_templates/people_element.Rmd",
                                      handle = .x$logins,
                                      avatar = .x$avatar)) |>
  cat(sep = "\n")

```
